pages.text: BMNW introduces a new energy system; the $(thing)$(l)Steam System$()!$(br)This new energy is obtained with naturally generating $(thing)$(l)Steam Hotspots$(), easily noticeable by the fact that it spews out steam particles.$(br)By building the structure seen on the right, $(item)$(l)Steam$() can be harnessed for personal gain!

pages.title: Steam Cover
pages.text: The $(item)$(l)Steam Cover$() is a crucial part for the obtaination of $(item)$(l)Steam$(), as it is the thing that catches the steam in the first place.$(br)By placing it on a working $(thing)$(l)Steam Hotspot$(), and completing the entire structure, it will control the steam system.

pages.title: Steam Switch
pages.text: The $(item)$(l)Steam Switch$() is also very important, as it allows you to toggle the steam input. When a $(item)$(l)Steam Outlet$() is placed above it, and the switch is flipped up, it will release steam.

pages.title: Steam Pipe
pages.text: The $(item)$(l)Steam Pipe$() is usually the most made steam-related component, as it is needed to tell the steam where to go.$(br2)$(l)Be aware that as of now, the steam system isn't fully done!$()

pages.title: Steam Hotspots
pages.text: The $(thing)$(l)Steam Hotspot$() is a naturally generating structure. When you encounter it, it may look like a cracked piece of bedrock. $(l)(This is due to a bug.)$()$(br)To fix it, just update it or wait a while, then a small area around it should become stone and it will start spewing out $(item)$(l)Steam$()!$(br)$(o)Creative mode players may use the Creative Source Placer to place one of these.$()
